pageProps.title: I have a new Junior Developer and it kinda sucks
pageProps.description: ChatGPT is all the rage these days. Is it really that good for developers though?

`,"The screenshots above were those that I can directly compare. In reality, the results were either incomplete or just wrong enough that I had to make many changes to get it to work. "))),mdx("h2",null,"It\u2019s like reviewing PRs instead of writing code"),mdx("p",null,"What\u2019s great about this is that I have something to work from.
